commits.message: fix: pasting not working in firefox (#9947)

associatedPR.title: fix: pasting not working in firefox
associatedPR.author: dwelle
associatedPR.body:
- fix https://github.com/excalidraw/excalidraw/issues/9934
- pasting / drag & dropping unsupported image file type now shows error
